snippet: Saudi Arabia has confirmed six new cases of the SARS-like coronavirus in its Eastern Province in recent days, the state news media reported.
abstract: Saudi Arabia confirms six new cases of SARS-like coronavirus in its Eastern Province, adding to previous tally of 24 confirmed cases since the disease was identified in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia has confirmed six new cases of the SARS-like coronavirus in its Eastern Province in recent days, the state news media reported.
